[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Scrum Alliance Platform (SAP) defines requirements for managing profiles, courses, events, and memberships.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: SAP supports profiles, courses, events, and memberships.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: SAP integrates with payment gateways, email services, and spreadsheet tools.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: SAP provides web dashboards for trainers, admins, and members.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: SAP operates on cloud and on-premises servers.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: SAP supports integrations with learning management systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: SAP ensures 24/7 availability with scheduled maintenance.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: SAP supports multilingual features and regional settings.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: SAP links to learning platforms and sponsor tools.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: SAP manages memberships, events, courses, approvals, and user privacy settings.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: SAP serves members, trainers, admins, and sponsors.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: SAP depends on internet access and external services.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: SAP complies with GDPR and PCI DSS.
[SUBSEC] 1.9 Acronyms and Abbreviations: PCI DSS: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with payment gateways for processing transactions (REQ-DB-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall send automated email notifications for membership renewals and event updates.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-003: The system shall allow spreadsheet uploads for participant management.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow users to TO-BE-DEFINED (REQ-DB-001, REQ-DSGN-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall provide search, filters, and RSS feeds for news and events.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall enable admins to approve events, advertisements, and sponsorships (REQ-ATTR-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive interface for memberships, courses, and events (REQ-FUNC-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process profile updates within 3 seconds (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support up to 5,000 concurrent users (REQ-ATTR-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store user profiles, course records, and events.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall manage memberships, sponsorships, and transactions (REQ-INTF-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with GDPR and encrypt user data.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to ISO standards for security.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall enforce role-based access control (REQ-FUNC-003).
[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall maintain 99.9% uptime and secure API transactions (REQ-PERF-002).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests profiles, enrollments, approvals, and transactions.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Architecture diagrams, role workflows, GDPR reports.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR standards, PCI DSS guidelines, and ISO security protocols.
